Issue MACROEXPAND-RETURN-VALUE:TRUE Summary

This passage is relevant to or affected by X3J13 Cleanup Issue MACROEXPAND-RETURN-VALUE:TRUE:

  • Function MACROEXPAND, MACROEXPAND-1
